sentences.sentence: Even humpback whales prefer to use the right side of their jaws to scrape sand eels from the ocean floor.
sentences.translation: 即使是座头鲸也喜欢用它们的右颚从海底刮沙鳗鱼。

sentences.sentence: The top-selling album, Songs of the Humpback Whale, was made public in 1970.
sentences.translation: 销量最高的专辑《座头鲸之歌》于1970年公开发行。

sentences.sentence: Humpback whales swim at a speed of 1.6 kilometers an hour from Alaska to Hawaii.
sentences.translation: 座头鲸以每小时1.6公里的速度从阿拉斯加游到夏威夷。
